doc:
Robert La Tourneaux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_La_Tourneaux 0 Robert La Tourneaux (November 22, 1941 – June 3, 1986) was an American actor best known for his role of Cowboy, the good-natured but dim hustler hired as a birthday present for a gay man, in the original Off-Broadway production and 1970 film version of The Boys in the Band. Robert_La_Tourneaux ( November_22_,_1941 – June_3_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_role of Cowboy , the_good-natured_but_dim_hustler hired as a_birthday present for a_gay_man , in the_original_Off-Broadway_production and 1970_film_version of The_Boys in the_Band .
